title: People Are Posting TikTok Videos of Their Relatives With Dementia. Should They?
sub_head: The posts can raise awareness but also spark debate about privacy and consent
body:
Dan Salinger posted a video on TikTok late last year of his dad, who has dementia, trying to start the car.
The video, which shows the two men arguing with each other, drew more than 875,000 views. Some viewers were sympathetic to Dan trying to look out for his father and some were critical that Dan lost his temper.
